channel.title: Awkward Bubble
channel.description: The Awkward Bubble is a weekly podcast hosted by husband and Wife (John and Lucy) join them as they talk about current events, family , friends and the awkward moments that we create but sometimes don't talk about.. you will hear it all, and much more. Be Awkward... that way no one bothers you.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Be Awkward .... That way no one bothers you!
channel.itunes:author: Awkward Bubble
channel.itunes:summary: The Awkward Bubble is a weekly podcast hosted by husband and Wife (John and Lucy) join them as they talk about current events, family , friends and the awkward moments that we create but sometimes don't talk about.. you will hear it all, and much more. Be Awkward... that way no one bothers you.

item.title: Episode 8 - I am in fact Batman and there are things I hate about Europe
item.description: Sorry for the long delay, but we had a lot to cover. In this episode, John reveals his super hero identity, and the things he finds annoying about Europe. Lucy Schools us all on the upcoming Zombie Apocalypse, and another NJ Transit Bus debacle.
item.dc:creator: Awkward Bubble
item.itunes:summary: Sorry for the long delay, but we had a lot to cover. In this episode, John reveals his super hero identity, and the things he finds annoying about Europe. Lucy Schools us all on the upcoming Zombie Apocalypse, and another NJ Transit Bus debacle.

item.title: Episode 7 - A patriots view and my left testical
item.description: in this episode John looks at some of our reviews and goes over the groups we may have offended and covers those yet to be offended. Johns Vasectomy goes off course. Traveling Whores ( A sugar Daddy Tale) Suck My Card, the man with the naked Lady Tattoo, and finally what the average college student doesn't know.
item.dc:creator: Awkward Bubble

item.title: Episode 6 - Dining in the dark, and the MWF Fall Fail
item.description: In this episode. John gives the Fat or pregnant update count.. and Lucy still doesn't care. The GNC Mafia is out of control, Lucy keeps falling, but not because of Dining in the Dark..Lastly.. The Carpet Muncher ....where are all the Wichita Peeps? Is Facebook Banned in Kansas?

item.title: Episode 5 - Shortround and The 7 Train Dookie
item.description: In this Episode we have a special Guest Douche, Frank who apparently gets a Chub from the Awkward Bubble opening sequence every time. . Lucy discusses Man Bracelets " How many is too many" and John's new favorite sports League the LFL..Football at its finest. and Last but not in the Least.. Frank discusses Lucy's Breasts ..

item.title: Episode 4 - Hunky Jesus and the Commuting Strippers
item.description: In this Episode, We have a special Guest for our Easter Show. We discuss office Bathroom Etiquette, and John Discovers that strippers commute just like regular people..Not that there's anything wrong with that..

item.title: Episode 3 - Lucy has a fan
item.description: John Loves the Irish, hates St Patrick's Day. Listener Tweets, Sexy baby talk, DJ Night MLP Remix. Who Farted.
item.dc:creator: Awkward Bubble

item.title: Episode 2 " I Love Dick..."
item.description: In this episode.. Swedish Fish Fight - Lucy Loves Dick, and Man child moments

item.title: Awkward Bubble Intro
item.description: This is the Awkward Bubble - A state that occurs in social situations involving two or more people in which one individual makes an awkward comment that causes all involved to cease conversing with one another. As the awkward bubble spreads from the source (original speaker), it leaves more silent in its wake as the general feeling of discomfort reaches more and more individuals.
item.dc:creator: Awkward Bubble
item.itunes:summary:
This is the Awkward Bubble -
A state that occurs in social situations involving two or more people in which one individual makes an awkward comment that causes all involved to cease conversing with one another.
As the awkward bubble spreads from the source (original speaker), it leaves more silent in its wake as the general feeling of discomfort reaches more and more individuals.
